title: Strengthening Healthcare Competencies: Leadership Development Course Based on Management Science

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced theoretical knowledge and mastery of high-level application skills
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can analyze management problems and propose solutions using a scientific decision-making framework.
Learners can establish project management plans by applying team leadership theories.
Learners can design and operate a data-driven performance evaluation system.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
